intro: Elatostema kinabaluense, commonly known as the Kinabalu stellaria, is a small herbaceous plant native to the mountainous regions of Borneo. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle and related plants. The plant is characterized by its rosette-forming leaves that are typically covered in fine, silky hairs. It produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Elatostema kinabaluense is adapted to high-altitude environments, where it thrives in cool, moist conditions.
